summary: The Decline of Western Civilization III is a 1998 documentary film that follows the gutter punk lifestyle of homeless teenagers.
cast: Stephen Chambers|Flea|Gary Fredo|William A. Kirkley|Ron Martinez|Keith Morris|Michael Orr|Angela Torrez Parker|Rick Wilder|Shawn Azad|Sacha Dunable|Allen Yelent
title: The Decline of Western Civilization Part III
